features.name: Automated Post-Purchase Surveys (VoC - Surveys)
features.description: Triggers surveys automatically via email or SMS following a transaction, improving feedback collection rates without manual effort.
pain_points_addressed: Inconsistent customer feedback collection after purchase
Low response rates to manual surveys

features.name: AI Agent for FAQ & First Response (AI Customer Service - AI Inbox)
features.description: Automatically handles frequent and repetitive queries, reducing agent load and improving first-response speed.
pain_points_addressed: High volume of repetitive customer queries
Slow first response times from support

features.name: Customer Journey Experience Analysis (Insights - Experience)
features.description: Aggregates and analyzes feedback across touchpoints to pinpoint where experience breaks down, enabling focused improvements.
pain_points_addressed: Unclear customer pain points across touchpoints
Lack of insight into experience bottlenecks

features.name: Customer Profile with Interaction History (Customer 360 - Customers & AI Inbox)
features.description: Builds a unified profile of each customer by stitching together historical interactions across all channels.
pain_points_addressed: No single view of customer history during support

features.name: AI-Powered Topic & Sentiment Analysis (VoC - Conversations/Surveys, Insights - Experience)
features.description: Uses natural language processing to extract topics and sentiment trends at scale, delivering real-time insights with minimal manual effort.
pain_points_addressed: Manual analysis of open-ended survey feedback is time-consuming
Hard to detect emerging customer sentiment trends in real time
